posts.post_content: I've regretted selling my T206 Bergen batting since the day I sold it. That said, I'd like to replace it. I also would like a Roy Ellam (preferrably with an OM back but not absolutely necessary). I need them SGC graded between 40-60 (depending on the price). Please send price and scan to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url] Thanks!

Which Bergen pose?

Also, here's an Ellam up for EBay today.  It's a PSA, but right within your grading range.
[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/1909-11-T206-ROY-ELLAM-SOUTHERN-LEAUGER-/350415666722?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item519666be22[/url]

--S

Shaun, it's Bergen batting. I saw the Ellam but I'd prefer SGC.
Thanks.

hmm, mine's the catching, so can't help ya there.  is the Bergen batting known to be a difficult common?
best of luck,
--S
I don't think so but I sure don't see many around compared to the catching version.
